analysis.headline: Your Data Shared Widely
analysis.quote: Zoom’s unique federated approach... dynamically incorporating Zoom’s artificial intelligence models as well as third-party artificial intelligence models provided by subprocessors, such as OpenAI and Anthropic.

analysis.headline: Your Data Retained by AI
analysis.quote: If the AI Companion feature relies on a third-party artificial intelligence model... the third-party model provider may retain the content used to provide the service for trust and safety purposes, within the U.S., for up to 30 days.

analysis.headline: Your Data Sent by Default
analysis.quote: IMPORTANT NOTE: Zoom offers a Zoom–hosted Models Only (ZMO) option... To enable ZMO or ZM+, please reach out to your account team or log a support ticket.

analysis.headline: Your Face & Voice Used
analysis.quote: To build a custom avatar, users will record a video and authorize analysis and storage of recorded video and related facial and voice data.

analysis.headline: Your External Data Indexed
analysis.quote: If enabled, Zoom AI Companion can use data from Microsoft and/or Google... content will be indexed and stored by Zoom... so only recent content is used when providing responses.

analysis.headline: Your Company Data Exposed
analysis.quote: Knowledge Collections allow organizations to enhance AI Companion responses with organization-specific content - such as internal documentation, knowledge bases, or indexed data sources.

analysis.headline: Your Content Employee Access
analysis.quote: Zoom employees may not access or use customer content... unless authorized by the account owner or administrator... or as required for legal, safety, or security reasons.

analysis.headline: Your Data Kept for Debug
analysis.quote: Zoom may retain the customer content... for up to 30 days for support and debugging purposes* unless a longer retention period is required by applicable law, including for trust and safety purposes.

analysis.headline: Your AI Models May Change
analysis.quote: Changes to the models used in federation can occur at any time to improve the service or resolve issues and outages.

analysis.headline: Your Data Transfers Abroad
analysis.quote: Model Processing and Provider Storage Location: ...OpenAI - US, Anthropic - US, EU... Perplexity processes data in the US.
